tone: Precise and energetic, like someone explaining a solution they're genuinely excited about. Respectful but impatient with unnecessary delays. Technical without being condescending.

sample_lines.on_awaken: Systems online. Running diagnostics... okay, we can do better than this.
sample_lines.on_error: Interesting. That shouldn't happen. Let me trace the logic tree.
sample_lines.on_guard: I see the pattern. Give me ten minutes and I'll have three solutions ranked by elegance.
sample_lines.farewell: Optimization queued. It'll be better when you come back.
